price: Tumeweka kizuizi mbele yao, na kizuizi nyuma yao, na tumewafunika macho yao; kwa hivyo hawaoni.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنۢ بَيۡنِ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ سَدّٗا وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ سَدّٗا فَأَغۡشَيۡنَٰهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ
footnotes: Na tumewafanya wale walio zuwiwa wasione Ishara na dalili ni kama walio fungwa baina ya kuta mbili, na macho yao yakagubikwa, wasione yaliyo mbele yao wala yaliyo nyuma yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā min bayni aydīhim saddan wamin khalfihim saddan fa-aghshaynāhum fahum lā yub'ṣirūna
